title: The Wild Tale of ‘Superman’ López Sees Another Twist: CAS Upholds Four-Year Doping Ban
content:
Miguel Ángel López remains banned for use of Menotropin after officials reject plea; in brighter news, contract extensions handed to Lippert, Landa, and Pogačar's liutenants.

Read the full article at The Wild Tale of ‘Superman’ López Sees Another Twist: CAS Upholds Four-Year Doping Ban on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
